Description:
We are looking to hire TELESALES EXECUTIVE to join our Company. If you're excited to be part of a winning team, opportunity is waiting for you!To contact prospects and existing customers to inform them about the services.
Able to reach the targeted number of appointments every day.
Offer the product appropriately to clients to make a sale or generate a lead
Contact potential clients in the UAE in order to increase sales opportunities
To set minimum 5 appointments per day.
Initiate sales with customers over the phone.
Asking questions to engage customers and keep the conversation going.
Listening to the customers' needs to generate repeat sales.
Gathering and documenting customer information.
Recording sales, correspondence, leads in internal database
Meeting sales quotas.
To maintain the database of all the interested customers
Go the “extra mile” to meet the target and facilitate future sales
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Cool-tempered and able to handle rejection
Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints
Call prospective customers & cold-calling customers to sell the service.Job Type: Full-timeSalary: AED2,500.00 - AED3,000.00 per monthSkills
